1: The flock enjoys constant care and gentle guidance.
2: A cherished community thrives under enduring care and presence
3: Sacred spaces stand renewed and thrive with enduring vitality.
4: Gatherings display guiding symbols that strengthen unity.
5: Recognition grows when people tackle big challenges.
6: Build and preserve beautiful craftsmanship with skill and respect.
7: Honor and safeguard sacred spaces; preserve their dignity and peace.
8: Communities preserve sacred gathering places and grow stronger together.
9: Embrace wisdom and guidance to discern the right time.
10: Honor the sacred always; praise endures and respect prevails.
11: Reveal your power and take decisive action now
12: Enduring divine sovereignty brings rescue throughout the world.
13: Strength opens paths through chaos and deep waters.
14: Provision nourishes people living in the wilderness.
15: Waters divide and dry, creating clear paths forward.
16: The maker orders day and night, providing light and sun.
17: The world thrives with balanced seasons and secure boundaries.
18: Respectful wisdom honors the sacred and uplifts community.
19: You keep the gentle safe and remember the poor community always.
20: I honor my commitment, spreading justice and compassion across the world.
21: The vulnerable come back honored, and the poor and needy celebrate.
22: Stand up and champion your just cause each day.
23: Constant attentiveness safeguards enduring peace and flourishing life.
